text.autoconfig.veindigging.option.sneak: Allow players to veindig while sneaking.
text.autoconfig.veindigging.option.bindA: Allow players with the mod to veindig with the keybind.
text.autoconfig.veindigging.option.maxBl: The maximum number of blocks that can be mined at once.
text.autoconfig.veindigging.option.maxRa: The maximum range that can be reached while mining.
